metadata.synopsis: The necromancer is sending a zombie to light the candles that start an arcane ritual which drains the player's hitpoints and ultimately turns them into a zombie.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe Necromancer_Audience"- Wait for the Necromancer's turn in combat, this should play on his first turn.
